text: My laptop is on its last legs and the new M1 Macs seem to be a great option. Do the people who bought them recommend them. And of so is the 16 GB of ram worth it or is the 8 GB enough

elements.text: My laptop is on its last legs and the new M1 Macs seem to be a great option. Do the people who bought them recommend them. And of so is the 16 GB of ram worth it or is the 8 GB enough

text: I refuse to buy anything with less than 32GB RAM. Otherwise, it won't last too long.

elements.text: I refuse to buy anything with less than 32GB RAM. Otherwise, it won't last too long.

text: I got one and it seems fine so far. Julia under Rosetta everything works, natively it’s faster but crashes, and most binary packages don’t work. I got 16GB but if it was my own money probably I’d have got 8.

elements.text: I got one and it seems fine so far. Julia under Rosetta everything works, natively it’s faster but crashes, and most binary packages don’t work. I got 16GB but if it was my own money probably I’d have got 8.

text: I got a Mac mini with 16gb.  I’m happy with it but have not tried Julia on it yet.

elements.text: I got a Mac mini with 16gb.  I’m happy with it but have not tried Julia on it yet.

text: I got a m1 with 16GB ram but have heard a few people saying they haven’t had any issues with 8. It’s a really amazing machine in my opinion, super fast and quiet, no issues with a zillion vscode windows and chrome tabs open. I got a dell xps in the fall but sold it to get the m1 in feb and it’s been a big upgrade.
